findings.quote: The US unemployment rate is 3.5% as of 2024
Average hourly earnings increased by 4.1% year-over-year
findings.issue: BLS reports real wage growth 0.6-1.4% in 2024. Source: bls.gov/opub/ted/2024

findings.quote: According to a recent Harvard study, remote work increases productivity by 13%
findings.issue: No Harvard study found with this claim. Source: hbs.edu/faculty/Pages/item.aspx?num=66633

findings.quote: A 2023 meta-analysis found that meditation reduces anxiety by 30%
findings.issue: No 2023 study found with 30% figure. Effect sizes 0.22-0.41 typical. Source: frontiersin.org/journals/public-health

findings.quote: Life expectancy in the US is 76.4 years
